We spent 5 days in Barcelona, and I have to say, the food was not as good as I'd expected.  I've eaten much better in Madrid and the south of Spain.  The only really stand-out place we went was this.  They have an eggplant and honey tapa that was so good, we returned the next night to have it again.  The vermouth was on tap and fantastic, and they have local microbrew beer, which is something I always look for.  The service also was wonderful--friendly and attentive.  There's both outdoor and indoor seating.  A really nice environment, and great food and drink.  GO.
